data.actual_result: no green circle indicating who is talking
data.expected_result: i should be able to see a green circle on the profile picture of the person actively talking
data.short_description: in a screen share enabled vc, users talking wont have a green circle on their names if they are screen sharing
data.steps_to_repro: - join a voice chat and ask someone to share their screen - notice how there isn't a green circle on their name when they talk or audio from the shared window is transmitted
